snippet.title: Psychopath Massacre - Launch Trailer 4k (NEW Found Footage Horror Game)
snippet.description:
⚡ - BUY NOW Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2917620/Psychopath_Massacre/

⚡ - BUY NOW Itch.Io
https://galacticcrows.itch.io/psychopath-massacre

⚡ NEW WEBSITE : http://galactic-crows.com ⚡

Psychopath Massacre is a first-person short psychological horror game with a VHS effect. (It's a short puzzle game) Be cautious and observant, because a sinister psychopath lurks within these rooms, hidden in the shadows and monitoring your every step.

George Dinescu kidnapped you in his home in Romania. Get out alive while utilizing a V.H.S camera to film everything that happens inside. Torture, murder, and dismemberment take place inside the house, exposing the frightening legacy of a serial killer's decade of terror.

The game uses microphone detection too, so you can use your voice to guide certain game actions (this is optional).

Instagram: https://instagram.com/galacticcrows
Twitter: https://twitter.com/galaccticrows
Facebook: https://facebook.com/galacticrows
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@galacticcrowsofficial
